title: 测试3
content:
### **中文**

我是谁？

你是谁？

| 做 | 好 | 人 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 真 | 但是 | 要 |
| 难 | 坚持 | 做 |
| 啊 | 到 | 底 |

```mermaid
journey
    title My working day
    section Go to work
      Make tea: 5: Me
      Go upstairs: 3: Me
      Do work: 1: Me, Cat
    section Go home
      Go downstairs: 5: Me
      Sit down: 5: Me
```

title: 测试2
content:
## 中文

中|文|字
---|---|---
英文|字|母

```js
const hello = 'hello world!'
console.log(hello)
```
```mermaid
journey
    title My working day
    section Go to work
      Make tea: 5: Me
      Go upstairs: 3: Me
      Do work: 1: Me, Cat
    section Go home
      Go downstairs: 5: Me
      Sit down: 5: Me
```
